zem-ext-menu.alert-recon:
Adding columns from DBpedia requires DBpedia-reconciled values in selected column.
 Reconcile this column with DBpedia first.

zem-ext-extend.header: Add Columns from DBpedia based on Column
zem-ext-extend.alert-timeout:
DBpedia request timed out, please try again later.
Check your connection and availability of DBpedia service.

zem-ext-extract.alert-error-extract: An error occured. Check your connection and/or API key.
